summary: Adds a big custom house in the outskirt of Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32765951/img/ElfarranSanctuary_Main-v2.png[/img][/center]

============== 
Description
==============
This mod will add a custom house in the outskirt of Riverwood near the bridge.
 
This is my first time creating a mod so please bear with me...
 
Inspired by Le Guin\'s work.
 
Endorse if you like this mod.

==============
Features
==============
- Bedroom
- Dinning room
- Dirty kitchen with tent
- Weapon and Armor showcase area
- Smithing area
- Backyard
- Teleport area
- Training area (Top)
- Secret dungeon (WIP)
- Shack for NPC (WIP)

==============
Install
==============
- Copy [Elfarran_Sanctuary.esp] in data directory.

==============
Uninstall
==============
- Remove [Elfarran_Sanctuary.esp] from data directory.

============== 
Note
==============
- The first time you install the mod, you must fast-travel to Riverwood. This is because some objects are not rendered properly when you walked to the sanctuary.
- You must frequently visit the sanctuary so you will not lose your items. I\'m not quite sure about this but since I\'ve been dropping items in Whiterun smithing area (outside the house) since day 1 and my items are still there.

==============
Changelog
==============
Version 2:
	- Added shack.
	- Added items to shelfs.
	- Added secret sanctuary (WIP).
	- Added location marker.
	- Applied navmesh by hand to ensure all is working properly and it\'s cleaner that way.

Version 1:
	- Created mod.

==============
Bugs
==============
- Some exterior objects not loading up. To fix this, you have to fast-travel to Riverwood. [Skyrim bug]
author: Frostsoup
